name: Shattered Mask
description:
Can you find the pieces of the mask and return home?

Join Barry, Serena, and Willis on their quest to find the pieces of the mask and return home to their respective time periods. Solve the mystery about the spirit sealed in the mask  and the powers that it holds. Travel through time making allies and facing enemies as you try to restore order to the world.

Gameplay

  • Solve the mystery of the mask by travelling through three time periods to find the missing pieces of the shattered mask
  • Explore the in game world as you travel through past, present and future
  • Use time magic to reverse time and heal your wounds after battle
  • Rely on space magic to help handle the 80+ enemies you can encounter

System Requirements (PC):

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
